segments.text: Well , as you know I was in Thailand last month , and I took a cooking class ! So I prepared some of my favorite dishes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great idea ! As long as I don't get food poisoning ! So what is on the menu tonight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , for starters we have Tom Yam soup . It's a bit spicy , but really good !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is delicious ! The ginger and lemongrass really gives it a nice taste !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now this next dish is one of the most famous . Foreigners call it papaya salad but the proper name is Tom Sam . It is a spicy salad made from a mix of fresh vegetables including shredded unripened papaya and tomato .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is delicious ! The combination of sour and spicy is really interesting ! I could have this everyday !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , now for the last and best dish in my opinion . This is called Pad Thai . It's stir-fried noodles with eggs , fish sauce , tamarind juice , red chili pepper plus bean sprouts , shrimp and tofu and garnished with crushed peanuts and coriander . It's practically Thailand's national dish !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow , this is great ! I never knew Thai food was so creative and delicious !
segments.speaker: S1
